name: Bubble Guppies
description:
Now your child can dive into this watery world of learning and laughter with over 20 interactive activities based on Nickelodeon’s top-rated preschool series. It’s a fin-tastic adventure like no other!

Features

1) Make a splash learning with the Bubble Guppies!
2) Explore the farm, the city and more
3) Use matching skills and color recognition
4) Zoom around in the big race
